# CoverageSettings.Customize method

For applying these settings in a pipeline; returns a delegate to transform a `ProcessArgumentBuilder` based on the current settings

```csharp
public Func<ProcessArgumentBuilder, ProcessArgumentBuilder> Customize()
```

## Return Value

`ProcessArgumentBuilder` to `ProcessArgumentBuilder` transform
